name: griiv/prestashop-module-contracts
description: Prestashop Module interface and Hook interface

copy-griiv-services: php -r "if (!is_dir('config/services')) { mkdir('config/services', 0777, true); } if (!is_dir('app/config')) { mkdir('app/config', 0777, true); } copy('vendor/griiv/prestashop-module-contracts/config/services_griiv.yml', 'config/services/services_griiv.yml'); copy('vendor/griiv/prestashop-module-contracts/config/services_griiv.yml', 'app/config/services_griiv.yml');"
import-griiv-services:
php -r '$file = "app/config/services.yml"; if (file_exists($file)) { $import = "
# Griiv services
imports:
  - { resource: services_griiv.yml }
"; $content = file_get_contents($file); if (false === strpos($content, "services_griiv.yml")) { $content = preg_replace("/^services:/m", $import . "services:", $content, 1); file_put_contents($file, $content); } }'
